data.name: Magyarock VR
data.detailed_description:
Magyarock is an acronym. Magyar means Hungarian and you know the other. :)

Magyarock VR is a drumming rhythm game where you can discover Hungarian metal / rock bands
while you are climbing to the top of the leaderboards.
The tracklist is diverse, maybe you will find your new favorite band while you are playing.

  • 15+ unique songs
  • 4 environments
  • compete against others on the leaderboards
  • 4 difficulties for each song
  • custom map support
  • streamer friendly (you can put song infos to the corners, you can choose from different cameras)
  • be the part of our community and make the game better with new ideas

data.short_description: Magyarock VR is a drumming rhythm game where you can discover Hungarian metal / rock bands while you are climbing to the top of the leaderboards. Be part of the community and help make the game better.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
